title: EcoFlow Wins TIME Best Inventions 2023 Award - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow's GLACIER portable refrigerator has been awarded the TIME Best Inventions 2023 Award in the Green Energy category, recognizing its environmental benefits and innovative features like a detachable battery for cordless power. The product enhances convenience for outdoor activities while aiming to reduce ecological impact. This accolade underscores EcoFlow's dedication to sustainable energy solutions in various markets. The company continues to develop cutting-edge eco-friendly products to support an environmentally responsible lifestyle.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the EcoFlow GLACIER significantly reduces ecological footprint associated with outdoor activities and promotes a commitment to environmental sustainability through its portable and energy-efficient design.
business_innovation: TRUE, because the EcoFlow GLACIER represents a new and improved product that differs significantly from previous portable coolers and has been introduced to the market.
green_product: TRUE, because the EcoFlow GLACIER is designed to minimize environmental impact throughout its life cycle by using sustainable production processes and providing functionalities that support low environmental impact during usage.
green_process: FALSE, because while the product itself is eco-friendly, the article does not describe any specific operational or manufacturing processes associated with the creation or use of the EcoFlow GLACIER that minimize environmental impacts.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing; 424490 - Other Grocery and Related Products Merchant Wholesalers; 339999 - All Other Miscellaneous Manufacturing; 423620 - Electrical and Electronic Appliance, Television, and Radio Set Merchant Wholesalers
greenwashing: FALSE, as the article provides specific examples of the EcoFlow GLACIER's features and accolades that genuinely support its claims of environmental benefits, rather than making vague or exaggerated claims.
